page.title: 08Primary Education in Ilford
page.content: {Our School}is St.Bede's. I come here every at 9.OOam. We have 7 classes, from Infants 1 to Junior 4. Our Head- mistress is Sister Peter and we have {6 lady teachers and one man.} School starts at 9.1O and ends at 3.45. We have two playgrounds, one for the {Infants}and one for the{Juniors.}In the summer, the boys play football; our school has its own team. All the trophies we win are put in our trophy cabinet. At playtime we have a teacher on duty, at dinner play some dinner ladies are on duty. Our school has its Church and its own music room and library with computer, video and tv. At school,{we learn to read and write so when we grow up we can get suitable jobs when we leave school. Anthony Lennon (Age 9)
